title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 484.7 - Time for payment of tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 484.7 - Time for payment of tax

State Regulations

Tax Law, §§ 506, 509(10)
(a) The tax is payable at the time the
monthly or quarterly return is required to be filed. (b) For penalties imposed in case of failure
to pay the tax when due, see section
488.1
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
484.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
